Docs.summary: Serves as the base class for columns that can bind to a property in the data source of a .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Windows.Data.BindingBase Binding { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Windows.Data.BindingBase Binding

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the binding that associates the column with a property in the data source.
Docs.value: The object that represents the data binding for the column. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Binding property allows a column to specify a property of the data grid's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> to bind to. For more information about binding paths, see the "Binding Path Syntax" section in [Binding Declarations Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the binding object to use when getting or setting cell content for the clipboard.
Docs.value: An object that represents the binding.

Docs.value: The style that is used when rendering an editing element. The registered default is . For information about what can influence the value, see .
